title: Bilawal condoles demise of Governor Punjab’s mother-in-law
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 02 (APP):Pakistan People’s Party (PPP) Chairman Bilawal Bhutto Zardari on Monday expressed his heartfelt condolences to Punjab Governor Sardar Saleem Haider over the demise of his mother-in-law.
The chairman PPP prayed for the deceased’s higher ranks in Jannat  and offered his sympathies to the bereaved family.
“May Allah give you and your family the strength to bear this loss,” Bilawal said in his condolence message.
